column1: GREAT NEWS!   @realDonaldTrump admin’s public-private partnership is paying off.  “Operation Warp Speed” delivers vaccine w/ 95% effectiveness in preventing COVID19... & doesn’t need super cold storage.  Bio-Tech company Moderna says 20 mil doses on the way by end of the year. https://t.co/Fkk4906QSh

If we shutdown our entire economy in the name of managing the spread we will unleash economic and public health hell on our citizens.    More of our fellow Americans will die from suicide overdose and deferred treatment than Covid related symptoms. (1/2) https://t.co/2CPi1qyCdc

Biden’s COVID advisor recommends a shutdown of our entire country.   That’s the most disconnected and absurd idea I’ve heard since the Democrat Leadership opposed travel restrictions from China. (1/2) https://t.co/tuA8sELRHr

All legally cast votes should be counted.  We opened this election up to fraud when we allowed so many flexibilities for COVID.   That doesn't mean there is mass fraud but it does mean we must give confidence and assurance back to the voters by further examining this.  Listen: https://t.co/tmsSf9lpDb
Please join me in praying for his wife Donna and his colleague Robbi Blount as they are still battling COVID-19.
TUNE IN: Today at 12 CT/1 ET I will be joining @TeamCavuto to discuss the latest on #COVID relief negotiations on @FoxBusiness.  Watch here: https://t.co/KJzybSArnI https://t.co/LF0YiyzNHD

Pelosi & Democrat Leadership chose as our last votes to condemn Qanon conspiracy theorists & the use of ‘Wuhan Virus’.   Not once in over 100 days of violence have they even mentioned Antifa & the Leftist mob assaulting police destroying our cities & terrorizing our citizens. https://t.co/bjg5q3AKpd

With COVID relief funding we have to ensure West Texas families in need can get temporary and targeted assistance in a way that incentivizes fully reopening our economy and returning to normal.  More w/ @BryanMuddKAMC: https://t.co/t0YnxjZf3i

Yesterday I met with the presidents and faculty members of @ACUedu @HSUTX & @mcmuniv to discuss covid relief efforts.    I am proud of them for embracing the risk and leaning into reopening our country. https://t.co/rCSAXQA7RR
TUNE IN: Tonight at 7:10 ET I'll be joining @LinseyDavis on @ABCNewsLive to discuss the reality of COVID in Texas.  Watch here: https://t.co/xqNa8hIUrw https://t.co/ckfx2Oqw3Z

The worst thing we could do is go back to a shutdown that impacts not only our economy but our health & safety greater than COVID ever could.  As long as we don't inundate our healthcare system this is part of the new risk we must manage b/c it's not going away anytime soon. https://t.co/g8cG7FW8i2

I’m proud to work with @RepScottPeters and colleagues on both sides of the aisle to include provisions in the next COVID legislation that will force Congress to address this looming debt crisis before it’s too late.  My full statement: https://t.co/qtrNp08vg7

“If a sparrow cannot fall from the sky w/o God’s notice it’s improbable an empire can rise w/o His aid.” -Ben Franklin  This #NationalDayOfPrayer I was honored to join @LubbockChamber in prayer via Zoom asking for God’s “aid” as we rise (& recover) from the fallout of COVID19. https://t.co/Tf48VXWOZD

W/ school trips to DC canceled due to #COVID19 I wanted to give WTX students a virtual tour of our nation’s capital: https://t.co/HKB7u6aD5m  Educators shape our children’s lives everyday & make it look easy! I hope my bloopers serve as a reminder that it’s harder than it looks! https://t.co/up8D846hHX
Join me in discussing the federal response to COVID-19 ongoing relief efforts & how we can strategically begin to reopen. https://t.co/2uYbdP7c3I
TODAY: join me on Facebook for a live Q&A session to discuss the federal response to #COVID19 strategy for safely reopening our economy & any concerns you may have. https://t.co/c0wzuabCW6

Right now our focus has to be response & relief but as we recover we must hold China & the complicit @WHO accountable for their #COVIDCoverUp.  This is expected from the communist regime but not organizations for which we fund & carry the water.  More w/ @mattmartinradio: https://t.co/MPpASpaEsr
TUNE IN: at 9:35 CT I’m joining @KFYO & @ChadHastyRadio to discuss #COVID19.  Listen here live: https://t.co/knQH7MQz1y https://t.co/2kTrTir2nA
For more information on how to #SlowTheSpread & the latest updates on #COVID19 please visit the @WhiteHouse & @CDCgov website: https://t.co/P9SZfRV34Y https://t.co/STvqkSsHKV

Proud to have @SteveScalise & 41 of my colleagues join me in sharing our thoughts w/@realDonaldTrump about helping our energy industry through these trying times.  As we recover from #COVID19 we must prioritize American oil & gas producers & maintain our energy independence. https://t.co/lpmo3D9APR

On #NationalDoctorsDay I want to say thank you to the doctors who are selflessly fighting this virus & all of our healthcare workers on the frontlines of the #COVID19 battle.   Words will never be able to express how grateful we are of the sacrifices you make & lives you save. https://t.co/O1KLKAVS8f
COMING UP: I’ll be joining @KFYO at 7:30 CT to discuss the federal response to #COVID19 & updated guidelines from the @WhiteHouse & @CDCgov.  Listen live: https://t.co/knQH7MQz1y

This is uncharted territory & an unprecedented crisis – extraordinary circumstances call for extraordinary measures.   We must move quickly to provide temporary relief for our working families small businesses & frontline health care professionals. #COVID19 #Coronavirus  Watch: https://t.co/NQkzuAgW81
ICYMI: If you were unable to join last night's telephone town hall you can listen to the entire discussion here.   #COVID19 #coronavirus   Link: https://t.co/8m6JgryR0F

Thank you to the constituents who called into our teletown hall to discuss the federal response to #COVID19.  I also want to thank the local & state officials healthcare workers ag & energy producers small biz owners & more who joined me on conference calls the past two weeks. https://t.co/HYz7yNf1Ov

COMING UP: Tune into the live stream of my Telephone Town Hall happening at 6:20 CT to hear my discussion with TX-19 constituents on the federal response to #COVID19.  LISTEN BELOW - https://t.co/kioDfuB8Kc

TONIGHT: I’ll be holding a telephone town hall to discuss the federal response to COVID-19 & answer any questions TX-19 constituents may have.   I encourage you to call in or follow along online by dialing (855)-962-1203 or streaming at https://t.co/gbzkdmyuoj tonight at 6:20 CT. https://t.co/JY8DfTxVy0

REMINDER: I will be hosting a Facebook Live Q&A today at 1 pm CT to discuss the latest updates on COVID-19 & it’s impact on our community.   Hearing directly from constituents helps me best serve TX-19 I hope you can tune in! https://t.co/jKOmbGfqdm

If we practice the @CDCgov & @WhiteHouse #SlowtheSpread guidelines for the next two weeks we will get through this with our nation & communities stronger than ever before.  My latest #CoronaVirusUpdate: https://t.co/mGPDO34vGH
TOMORROW: I’ll be hosting a @Facebook Live Q&A on confronting and controlling #Covid_19. https://t.co/qemvPWajQj
RIGHT NOW: I’m on @KFYO w/ @mattmartinradio to talk about #coronavirus in Lubbock & what each of us can do to prevent prepare & #SlowtheSpread.   Listen live: https://t.co/Q2PaOWO3Pq

For prevention and preparation resources as well as the most recent updates on #Covid_19 follow -  ❗️@WhiteHouse  ❗️@CDCgov  ❗️@TexasHHSC   My statement on Lubbock’s first confirmed #coronavirus cases: https://t.co/6Zj81rzkj5

Stay vigilant but remain connected. Even within the walls of our own homes modern technology allows us to connect with loved ones across the street or across the globe.  @WhiteHouse & @CDCgov #StopTheSpread guidelines: https://t.co/eSjucyfGCk  My latest statement on #Covid_19: https://t.co/R5Ih9lbhAL
My latest update on #COVID19:  For information on prevention and preparedness please visit the @CDCgov #Coronavirus resources website - https://t.co/PsJ1meEYoL https://t.co/wLR6XxlZz5

#COVID19 should be taken seriously but we must keep things in perspective & not panic or overreact.   Prevention & containment efforts must be aggressive; any economic assistance must be targeted & temporary.  My interview w/ @newsmax: https://t.co/KHcpiAc8Oo

Today I toured the @HHSGov #COVID2019 command center w/ @WaysandMeansGOP.   While the current outbreak is something to take seriously we shouldn’t panic. This admin led by @POTUS @VP & top health officials has a good comprehensive plan to contain & mitigate this threat. https://t.co/A6f8IZpTCp

Maintaining the safety of Americans is the most important job of the federal govt & I look forward to working w/ @POTUS & @VP to quickly & effectively contain & mitigate this threat.  For updates on the #CoronaOutbreak follow @CDCgov.  My full statement: https://t.co/LnsHnXaMje
